item.title: pyramid_fullauth 0.4 - python3 and few fixes
item.dc:creator: Grzegorz Śliwiński
item.description:
I've just released version 0.4 of my pyramid extension, pyramid_fullauth. It's goal is to allow to add authentication abilities - both password- and social-based authentication - to pyramid based apps by the means of configuration mostly.

This version comes with limited python3 compatibility, and two bugfixes.

item.title: pyramid_fullauth can speak Your language now
item.dc:creator: Grzegorz Śliwiński
item.description:
A couple of days ago, I completed and released new version of pyramid_fullauth, now at 0.1. This package aims to provide full authorization and authentication functionality for Your pyramid application. It provides standard email authentication, and by integrating velruse, it also allows for broad spectrum of social and oauth2 services authentication, by just the means of settings config! So what's new in version 0.1?
